text:
[Verse]
Sun is shining high
Friends are coming by
Music in the sky
Let’s not say goodbye

[Verse 2]
Neighbors waving hi
Balloons reaching high
Laughter never shy
Let’s give it a try

[Chorus]
We dance all night
Under neon light
Hearts take flight
Feels so right

[Verse 3]
Grill is smoking hot
Ice in every pot
Games we haven’t bought
Good times on the spot

[Bridge]
Kids just running free
Climbing up the tree
Everyone just be
So wild and carefree

[Chorus]
We dance all night
Under neon light
Hearts take flight
Feels so right
title: Backyard Party
